name: Lunar Landing (MicaiahArts)
description:
The Earth and Moon are under attack by unknown invaders! As the defender of these two celestial bodies, Kunik-Lo rises up to the monumental task of descending from her moon base and restoring peace to the land. Jump, stomp and fire at enemies to reach ancient temples scattered across the levels that will form protective barriers and fend off the unwanted visitors.

Lunar Landing is a 3D, third-person platformer. Players control Kunik-Lo, a moon rabbit inspired by the Rabbit on the Moon legend. The game has three levels: an Earth, Asteroid, and Moon level. Each level has waves of enemies that are preventing Kunik-Lo from activating ancient temples that will protect the lands. Players must defeat each enemy within the levels and navigate around the environments with the moon bunny's abilities:

-Crescent-shaped Projectiles that can defeat enemies and destroy objects.

-Double Jump over big gaps and reach higher places.

-Ground Pound on enemies and interact with items.

-Gravitate toward asteroids and landmasses in space.

Activate all three ancient temples and Kunik-Lo's realm will be safe once more!
